title: Digital Literacy-Based Cognitive Presence Enhancement Microlearning Course in Mathematics for Nursing Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device operation skills and secondary-level mathematics knowledge
context.additional_context: Strengthening work-integrated mathematical problem-solving skills for working professionals who study via mobile devices after daytime duties

learning_goals: Learners can independently solve 80% or more of mathematical problems encountered in workplace settings using digital tools.
Learners can perform self-directed cognitive reflection activities at least three times per week using a microlearning platform.
Learners can share mathematical problem-solving strategies with peer learners at least once a week using digital collaboration tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
